sections.heading: tangible personal property tax valuation or penalty; appeal; procedure; collection procedures
sections.text: For purposes of section 77-1233.04:(1) The county assessor shall notify the taxpayer, on a form prescribed by the Tax Commissioner, of the action taken, the penalty, and the rate of interest. The notice sha

sections.heading: and this section control a taxpayer's appeal from a decision of a county board of equalization to the Tax Equalization and Review Commission when a county assessor changes a taxpayer's reported valuation of personal property to conform to net book value
sections.text: Prime Alliance Bank v. Lincoln Cty. Bd. of Eq
